channel.title: Comments on: iPhone 2nd Generation … too much for me and my budget.

item.title: By: Sean McLeod
item.dc:creator: Sean McLeod
item.description: How about the new HTC Touch Diamond. Looks like more 'fun' than a boring Treo and includes Opera as well.
item.content:encoded: How about the new HTC Touch Diamond. Looks like more ‘fun’ than a boring Treo and includes Opera as well.

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description:
How much is your normal in-home internet service?
(Trying to compare what I pay which is $60 US/m for 2mb down/756kb up).
item.content:encoded:
How much is your normal in-home internet service?

(Trying to compare what I pay which is $60 US/m for 2mb down/756kb up).

item.title: By: Rory Primrose
item.dc:creator: Rory Primrose
item.description: $30/m unlimited data. That's amazingly cheap compared to the Australian plans. Try $100/m plus. Often it's only $100/m for a gig.
item.content:encoded: $30/m unlimited data. That’s amazingly cheap compared to the Australian plans. Try $100/m plus. Often it’s only $100/m for a gig.
